title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Student Loan Giant’s Loss in Court (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Student Loan Giant’s Loss in Court (Audio)
description:
Dalie Jimenez, professor at the University of Connecticut School of Law and founding member of the CFPB, discusses Navient Corp.'s recent courtroom woes as their attempts to block two CFPB lawsuits failed. She speaks with Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
